node.description:
Converts Forge Strike into a sword that falls from the sky instead. Forge Strike has more attack speed (multiplicative with other modifiers), cannot crit, and critical strike multiplier from the tree is converted to bleed chance.

Converts to a polearm if you also have the {Spear Forge} node.
node.nodeDescription:
A sword drops from the sky instead. [35%] more attack speed. Cannot crit. Converts critical strike multiplier from the tree to bleed chance.

Converts to a polearm instead if you also have Spear Forge.
